title: FingerPrint
desc: Authentication using the Finger Print sensor in your Android Device

title: Bar Code and QR Scanner
desc: Camera Scanner for QR codes, Bar codes and other supported formats

title: Credit Card Reader
desc: Scanner for Credit Cards using the Card.io SDK from Paypal.

title: Digital Signature
desc: Signature Pad with the ability of saving the Signature as na image in your gallery.

title: Camera Roll
desc: Obtains images from the Camera of your Android Device or from the Galley.
